TRANSFER INSTRUCTIONS (also included in your order) - General instructions are as follows but adjustments should be made depending on your heat press. - Set temperature to 385 - 400 degrees Fahrenheit. - Set timer to 50-60 seconds. - Set the pressure at medium. - Put parchment or butcher paper inside the garment to ensure the ink does not bleed through the shirt to the back.
